subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The seven-time Formula One world champion Michael Schumacher will be back behind the wheel of a Ferrari when he steps in as a test driver for his former team. Schumacher, 39, will drive Monday in Barcelona, Spain. His time behind the wheel will allow the Ferrari driver Felipe Massa to rest before the season starts March 16 in Melbourne, Australia.
